DOC.criteria: Age 30 60 year English speaking Hypertension Heart disease : history coronary artery disease , myocardial infarction , significant valvular disease , congestive heart failure Diabetes Renal disease Anxiety disorder Depression Other psychiatric condition include schizophrenia bipolar disorder Attentiondeficitdisorder Attentiondeficithyperactivity disorder Musculoskeletal condition limit capacity perform simple movement chronic low back pain neck pain Pulmonary disorder ( asthma , chronic obstructive lung disease , obstructive sleep apnea ) Smoker Currently take blood pressure medication , oral diabetic medication insulin Current participation mindbody practice/program Current cancer non melanoma skin cancer Regular swimmer Plays wind brass musical instrument After two week screen period unable : Breathe 8 less minute Breathe 3 less breath minute Practiced le 3 time week
